testCase.name: AppController - root - should return "Hello Backend!"
main - should start the application
CustomLogger - should be defined
CustomLogger - should log a message
HTTPLoggerMiddleware - should log the correct information
testCase.error: ReferenceError: logger is not defined at /home/runner/work/quickstart-aws-sql/quickstart-aws-sql/backend/src/middleware/req.res.logger.spec.ts:15:5 at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)

testCase.name: UserController - should be defined
UserController - create - should call the service create method with the given dto and return the result
UserController - findAll - should return an array of users
UserController - findOne - should return a user object
UserController - findOne - should throw error if user not found
UserController - update - should update and return a user object
UserController - remove - should remove a user
UserController - GET /users/search - given valid query parameters_should return an array of users with pagination metadata
UserController - GET /users/search - given invalid query parameters_should return a 400 status code with an error message
UserController - GET /users/search - given sort and filter as invalid query parameters_should return a 400 status code with an error message
UserService - should be defined
UserService - createOne - should successfully add a user
UserService - findAll - should return an array of users
UserService - findOne - should get a single user
UserService - update - should call the update method
UserService - remove - should return {deleted: true}
UserService - remove - should return {deleted: false, message: err.message}
UserService - searchUsers - should return a list of users with pagination and filtering
UserService - searchUsers - given no page should return a list of users with pagination and filtering with default page 1
UserService - searchUsers - given no limit should return a list of users with pagination and filtering with default limit 10
UserService - searchUsers - given limit greater than 200 should return a list of users with pagination and filtering with default limit 10
UserService - searchUsers - given invalid JSON should throw error
UserService - convertFiltersToPrismaFormat - should convert input filters to prisma's filter format
